issue.title: [CF 811] attempt to index local 'self' (a nil value)

> Posted by CurseForge user kaustos | Imported from CurseForge issue #811 | Raw

comments.body:
Huh. That's weird. This is caused by a change that I made to TMW's callback system, but I'm not sure why it is happening since I did extensive testing on it. I guess it wasn't extensive enough. I will take a look ay why this is happening when I get home. Thanks for the report.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Give r809 a shot and see if that fixes the problem.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Nope, same error.


> Posted by CurseForge user kaustos

Looks like this was the result of a fundamental flaw with TMW's callback system. I changed the way that it work internally so that this error should no longer happen under any circumstance.

Should be fixed in r810 now.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
